title: Did Giuliani tweet Wuhan's lab $3.7 million from the United States in 2017?
subtitle: Juliani implicitly echoed President Donald Trump ' s assertion that the corona 19 virus came from a laboratory in Wuhan.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Rudy Giuliani correctly tweeted that a research laboratory in Wuhan, China, received a $3.7 million grant from the United States in 2017, despite the prohibition of such funding.
